config.section.roosterOptions.name: Rooster Options
config.paragraph.customizeRoosters.name: Customize your roosters per type!
config.section.general.name: General Settings
config.section.Produces.name: Produces
config.section.DeluxeProduces.name: Deluxe Produce
config.section.DeluxeProduces.descriptio: In Stardew Valley, when your animals are happy enough, they produce something special, known as “Deluxe Produce.” Each animal has its own type of deluxe item, like Large Eggs from chickens or Duck Feathers from ducks.
config.section.white.name: White Rooster
config.section.brown.name: Brown Rooster
config.section.blue.name: Blue Rooster
config.section.void.name: Void Rooster
config.section.gold.name: Gold Rooster
config.section.originalhatching.name: Original Hatching Options
config.section.originalhatching.descript: Only valid if 'Hatching Type' is set to 'Original'.
config.section.fertilizedhatching.name: Only Fertilized Eggs Options
config.section.fertilizedhatching.descri: Only valid if 'Hatching Type' is set to 'Only Fertilized Eggs'.

config.Text.updateRate.name: Update Rate
config.Text.updateRate.description: Set how often the rooster's stats are updated.
config.Number.ChosenPercentage_DailyLuck: The percentage of daily luck bonus applied to the hatching probabilities.
config.Text.hatchingMode.name: Hatching Type
config.bool.betterTrufflesCompat.name: Better Truffles Mod Compat.
config.bool.betterTrufflesCompat.descrip: Enable compatibility with the Better Truffles mod.
config.Bool.enablestuckInside.name: Stuck Inside Workaround
config.Bool.enablestuckInside.descriptio: Automatically switches the harvest type to “DropOvernight” during bad weather conditions, ensuring that your rooster will drop its produce the following day. When the weather clears up, the harvest type reverts to the original setting.
config.Bool.enableeggProbability.name: Normal Egg Probability
config.Bool.enableeggProbability.descrip: Enable the probability of normal eggs hatching a rooster.
config.Bool.enablelargeEggProbability.de: Enable the probability of large eggs hatching a rooster.
config.Bool.enablefertilizedEggProbabili: Enable the probability of fertilized eggs being laid.
config.Bool.BypassBlueConditions.name: Bypass Unlock Conditions
config.Bool.BypassBlueConditions.descrip: Bypass the unlock conditions for the blue chicken.
config.Bool.EnableDebug.name: Debugging
config.Bool.EnableDebug.description: Enable debugging for helping with bug-fixing.
config.Text.harvestType.name: Harvest Type
config.Number.EggProbability.name: Egg Probability
config.Number.EggProbability.description: The probability of a normal egg hatching a rooster.
config.Number.largeEggProbability.name: Large Egg Probability
config.Number.largeEggProbability.descri: The probability of a large egg hatching a rooster.
config.Number.fertilizedEggProbability.d: The probability of a fertilized egg being laid.
config.Number.boostbyrooster.name: Boost By Rooster
config.Number.boostbyrooster.description: The boost by rooster applied to the probability of a fertilized egg being laid.
config.Number.roosterToChickenRatio.name: Rooster Chance
config.Number.roosterToChickenRatio.desc: The chance of roosters hatching from the fertilized egg. It's either rooster or chicken. So if you set it to 40, the chicken chance will be 60(100-40). Only Valid if Hatching Type is 'Only Fertilized Eggs'.
config.Text.BlueEggChoice.name: Blue Egg
config.Number.MatureDays.name: Rooster Maturity Days
config.Number.MatureDays.description: The number of days it takes for the rooster to mature.
config.Number.ProduceDays.name: Production Days
config.Number.ProduceDays.description: The number of days it takes for the rooster to produce.
config.Text.BuildingRequired.name: Required Building
config.Text.BuildingRequired.description: The building required for the rooster.
config.Number.Price.name: Rooster Price
config.Bool.Buyable.name: Can Be Purchased
config.Bool.Buyable.description: Whether the rooster can be bought.
config.Bool.EnableRoosterHatching.name: Enable Hatching
config.Bool.EnableRoosterHatching.descri: Enable the rooster to hatch from eggs.
